p: In the case of extracting oils from the leaves, the best method of obtaining compounds such as camphene, 1.8-Cineole, and camphor was the HD method, while in the case of borneol and borneol acetate content, the SD method was the best. Moreover, in the case of obtaining 1.8-Cineole, HD and SD methods turned out to be homogeneous in terms of the value of this feature ( Table 4).
